about_the_game:
Embark on a harrowing journey through the depths of space, a captivating sci-fi space horror game. Set in a post-apocalyptic world ravaged by the aftermath of the Third World War, humanity's remnants have been cast out from Earth, seeking refuge in the uncharted territories of the cosmos. However, their salvation soon turns into a nightmare as they encounter a series of unfathomable challenges that threaten their very existence.

You find yourself aboard a colossal spaceship bound for Jupiter, the last bastion of hope for the defeated nations. But amidst the vast emptiness of space, your vessel comes to a halt, trapped in the clutches of dwindling resources and the insidious presence of violent cults. Racial tensions and hatred run rampant, pushing the fragile fabric of society to its limits.

As the protagonist, you awaken with no recollection of your past, your memories lost in the abyss. Yet, a mysterious voice beckons you, calling you to embrace your destiny as the chosen one. Guided by this enigmatic presence, you embark on a treacherous quest to reclaim the glory of a legacy foretold, while grappling with the horrors of the unknown.

Explore the eerie corridors of the dormant spacecraft, shrouded in shadows and echoing with the whispers of forgotten souls. Encounter a diverse cast of survivors, each grappling with their own fears and hidden agendas, as you navigate through a world teetering on the brink of madness. Uncover the secrets buried deep within the ship's bowels, piecing together fragments of your past and unraveling the enigma of your purpose.

Tread carefully, for danger lurks around every corner. Unleash your resourcefulness and cunning to overcome relentless adversaries, both human and otherworldly. Engage in intense battles against grotesque creatures, armed with an arsenal of improvised weapons and advanced technology salvaged from the ship's decaying infrastructure.

Key Features:
- A gripping sci-fi space horror experience
- Unveil the mysteries of the ship and your own past, piece by haunting piece
- Engage in intense combat against relentless adversaries
- Explore a meticulously crafted vessel filled with atmospheric detail
- Encounter a cast of diverse characters, each with their own stories to tell
- Immerse yourself in stunning visuals and spine-chilling audio design
- Uncover the echoes of eternity and shape the destiny of humanity

Prepare to embark on an unforgettable odyssey into the heart of darkness. Will you reclaim your legacy and guide humanity towards redemption, or will you succumb to the horrors that await in the void of space?

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

name: New Roanoke

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: intel Core i5_6400 or AMD FX 8320
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7_7700
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 MB available space

short_description: "New Roanoke" delivers an immersive narrative experience, blending elements of horror, suspense, and psychological thriller. Immerse yourself in a meticulously crafted sci-fi world, brought to life by stunning visuals, atmospheric soundscapes, and chillingly realistic character performances.
